sentence.Network_en: His manual dexterity and fine spatial skills were wasted on routine tasks.
sentence.Network_cn: 他灵巧的动手能力和杰出的空间识别能力都浪费在日常事务上了。
韦恩的语言表达能力很强。

sentence.Network_en: You need manual dexterity to be good at video games.
sentence.Network_cn: 玩好电子游戏手要灵巧。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in the sense 'mental adroitness'): from French dextérité, from Latin dexteritas, from dexter 'on the right'

entry.def: Dexterity is skill in using your hands, or sometimes your mind.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ambi二+dextrous=dexterous[adj.灵巧的,熟练的]→两手都是右手[都很灵巧]
dexter右边+ous……的→右手一般比左手灵活

stems_affixes.value_cn: 右侧的,右旋的,用右手的
stems_affixes.word_buile: dextr=dexter右边+al……的→adj.右侧的,右旋的,用右手的
